attributes.action: actively encourage sport within schools and the community.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should stop allowing councils and schools to sell playing fields and other sports facilities whilst encouraging the use of the facilities by the public. The government should stop the politically correct attitude which exists amongst many schools and encourage the reintroduction of competitive sports, school sports days and the introduction of interschool leagues. This improve the health of the nation and reduce the cost for the NHS.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/extracurricular/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
